VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: carbuncle conjurer
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Call upon mystical carbuncles for help.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Carbuncle Conjurers are capable of calling upon friendly carbuncles, animals which can fight and haul. Summoned Carbuncles cannot breed and do not leave a corpse when killed.
